body:
> This PR only covers the removal of the code from this repo. The renaming and reorganizing of the code in mozilla-central is a separate concern. It has been in the tree for over a year by the name "shield-recipe-client". I don't want to rename it just now.

Is there a bug for it that I can follow?
body_text:
This PR only covers the removal of the code from this repo. The renaming and reorganizing of the code in mozilla-central is a separate concern. It has been in the tree for over a year by the name "shield-recipe-client". I don't want to rename it just now.

Is there a bug for it that I can follow?
body_html:
This PR only covers the removal of the code from this repo. The renaming and reorganizing of the code in mozilla-central is a separate concern. It has been in the tree for over a year by the name "shield-recipe-client". I don't want to rename it just now.

Is there a bug for it that I can follow?
